original_text:
For he stands at the right hand of the needy one,
    to save him from those who condemn his soul to death.
korean_text: 그가 궁핍한 자의 오른쪽에 서사 그의 영혼을 심판하려 하는 자들에게서 구원하실 것임이로다

sentences.original_text: For he stands at the right hand of the needy one,
from those who condemn his soul to death.
